mapper.select: Select T1.userId ,T1.userName ,T1.groupId ,T2.groupName ,T1.authId ,T1.auth ,CASE WHEN T1.authId = T1.userId Then '개인권한' ELSE T3.groupName END As authName ,IFNULL(T1.excelAuth,'N') As excelAuth ,T1.password ,password(#{inPassword}) As inPassword ,T1.email ,T1.officePhone ,T1.officePhone As officePhoneFormat ,T1.mobliePhone ,T1.mobliePhone As mobliePhoneFormat ,T1.ip ,T1.createUserId ,T1.updateUserId ,T1.createDateTime As CreateDateTime ,T1.updateDateTime As UpdateDateTime ,T1.useYn ,T1.deletedYn ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.pwdChangeDateTime, '%Y-%m-%d') as pwdChangeDateTime ,date_add(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), interval (Select T4.codeId from ofCode T4 where T4.codeGroupId='PW01') month) as pwCycleDate ,case When T1.auth <> '03' Then ( Case When cast((select resultLastPoint from adSmsHistory where resultMessage='Success!!' order by smsDateTime desc limit 1 ) as SIGNED) < cast((Select T4.codeId from ofCode T4 where T4.codeGroupId='SP01' ) as SIGNED) Then 'Y' Else 'N' End ) Else 'N' End smsAlarmYn ,(Select T4.codeId from ofCode T4 where T4.codeGroupId='SP01' ) as smsAlarmPoint From ofUser T1 Left Join ofGroup T2 On T1.groupId=T2.groupId Left Join ofGroup T3 On T1.authId=T3.groupId Where T1.userId = #{userId} And T1.deletedYn='N'
select mobliePhone from ofUser Where groupId=#{groupId} and smsYn='Y'

Select T3.mobliePhone from adRecovery T1 Left Join adCollect T2 On T1.collectCode = T2.collectCode Left Join ofUser T3 On T1.groupID = T3.groupId Where T2.recoveryClosingDate = DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval +1 day) , '%Y-%m-%d') And T3.smsYn = 'Y' And T1.recoveryState ='01'
